short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checking the lexical item on any websites using double click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A dictionary that works on any website. Simply double click to fetch the meaning, pronunciation. It currently supports 5 in 1 dictionaries including English - Vietnamese, English - English, Collocation Dictionary, Basic Dictionary and Thesaurus.
